item.title: ‘The history, glory, and culture of Raichur district will be displayed in three-day Utsav’
item.description:
<![CDATA[Minister for Medical Education Sharan Prakash Patil has said that the most anticipated Raichur Zilla Utsav would display the glory, history, and culture of the district to the outside world in the three-day event.
He was addressing the audience after inaugurating the Raichur Zilla Utsav 2026, organised by the district administration, zilla panchayat, and various government departments at the University of Agriculture Sciences (UAS) in Raichur on Wednesday.
Dr. Patil, who is also the district i...]]>
